alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 4:03AM MST until December 28 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow of 8 to 14 inches over the higher mountains. Snowfall around South Pass will be 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. South Pass will see blowing and drifting snow and limited visibility, with wind gusts well over 40 mph.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
